content.body: but if not, I'd suggest `#_`; if we can't use # or @ alone then we're clearly dead in the water on single-character solutions, but the ideal solution if we were starting from scratch would obviously be `_`. so if we've been tending to use # as a sigil for stuff lately then it seems reasonable to sigilize `_`. presumably this doesn't cause any problems since `#_` would only be currently valid as an `in` LHS
